name: Brave Slime Adventure
description:
Brave slime adventure

Description:

You play as a slime, chained by evil scientist. Your purpose is break out from the lab, generated special for  measure your possibilities. What will you do? Can you pass every test made for you? 

Controls:

WASD: movement

Spacebar: jump

Escape: open pause menu

1, 2, 3 + mouse wheel (forms should be found): switch forms
